title: Get Hired Ft @FORTNITE_RIZZER by|| #All #Animations #Trending #music #stories #art #tutorials
Color Split  -  1/2/3/4 players game v1.9
desc:
/!\ No ads please ! ad = report
My last game was a long time ago...
100% by me, inspired by a existing game but not famous at all and I remastered it. My bot is so much better too.
credit: BaDoink for the lobby music
I created the game music with suno.ai
SandBox mode: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/1121737759/
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
2025/01/09 : Featured ! Thank you soooo much scratch team !!!!
2025/02/11 : on "What the Community is Remixing" with 510 remixes... You guys are crazy !
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FAQ:
The bot is too easy !
-> I did the best bot I can with scratch limits. 

What game inspired you ?
-> A game in the 1234 player app, but I modified some rules to make it better !

Can you add the possibility to choose how many bots we play with?
-> I could, but I'm facing some difficulties. How to do it for the interface and only "easy" mode would be possible (for some reasons). I will do this on the sandbox mode.

Why Turbowarp ?
-> Only the hard bot can't turn on scratch without lagging a lot.

How the AI works ?
-> Go inside the project and clic on the link for explainations
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
v1.0: game shared
v1.1: bug corrected
v1.2: Remove the possibility of passing the first 3 marbles to boxes that are too advantageous at the start
v1.3: easter egg added
v1.4: random player added
v1.5: a real bot, still with not a great level !
v1.6: you can now change your difficulty !
v1.7: hard difficulty (only on turbowarp)
v1.8: replay
v1.9: music added

sandbox: v0.1
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/1121737759/

title: Nifty Chemistry
desc:
I don't really care if you advertise or F4F here, just try not to drown the actual comments please

made for Nifty Effects (SDS)

mobile friendly

all code and every costume other than the test subjects by me

costumes of the test subjects are images from scratch or the internet, you can find the original creators by putting the costumes in google images

music is Iron Oath by Laudividni
>https://www.youtube.com/@LaudividniYT

sounds are from pixabay


disclaimer:
this project is in no way a reference to unethical experimenting on animals irl, it is just for fun and no animals are being harmed within this project

title: ✧*̥˚ OC Maker *̥˚✧
desc:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/1160832732

I won't be able to respond to every comment but I really appreciate all of them and I do see them!! Thank you all SOO much!!!

Tysm for all of the likes and favorites and 4000+ views?!??!?! It means a lot to me!!! ❤️ ❤️ ❤️

Made for SDS!

Art & code by me! <3
Hope you enjoy my game :D

I'm sorry for how limited the selection is for the game. I've been see your comments asking for small, reasonable changes like more gender options, multiple eye colors, multiple skin details, etc. and I really do like these ideas! Sadly, I don't really have the time nor the motivation to make these changes right now. Is it possible in the future? Maybe! But for now, please understand that I have a lot going on and I won't be able to add these things right away. Thank you for your comments, I do still appreciate your feedback!

title: Blinchmas RPG: The Quest For Knee Surgery
desc:
OST Used:
- Dr. Seuss' and Tyler the Creator's Grinch songs
- Block Tales OST
OH HEY THERE #1 IN ALL AND 15K VIEWS IN THE FIRST DAY

Press E, Z or click/tap to progress through dialogue.

Tips to make the game more fun!

- Make sure to fight most enemies to level up as much as you can
- Try not to run from battles; that is hard to do on purpose.
- There is no arrow to follow, just go down the mountain
- That feeling when knee surgery is tomorrow
- Think strategically! This game can be puzzling

title: ☢️ Ballistic Chickens 2
desc:
Ballistic Chickens 2 ᵥ₁.₁.₃

     Launch chickens out of cannons.
    How many obstacles can you destroy?

      ❤️ + ⭐ If you like the game!
  This project took a long time to make, so I would 
   appreciate it a lot! (It took about 6 months)
   (ɴᴏ ᴀᴅs ᴛʜᴇʏ ᴡɪʟʟ ʙᴇ ᴅᴇʟᴇᴛᴇᴅ ᴀɴᴅ ʀᴇᴘᴏʀᴛᴇᴅ)

⚠️ Recommended to play in TurboWarp here:
turbowarp.org/969222313/ ⚠️ (Not required but better quality)

You can also check it out on itch!
https://ezbreez.itch.io/ballistic-chickens-2

❗If you want to change the graphics quality, audio, or SAVE / LOAD, go to the main menu and click settings❗

 ============= Instructions =============

 ⚠️ If you encounter some bug, just press the green flag again and it should resolve.
 ⌨️ Only a mouse is needed to play this
 All instructions in-game
 (Press the help button in the main menu if you get confused)

 ====================================

 @i - First

 =============== Credits ===============

 Lens Flares and Sun  
  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/666704223 

 Vector Explosion
  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/144907140/

 Inspiration
  @mrVoo on repl.it

 Music
  fesliyanstudios.com

 Sound Effects
  the internet ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

 Thumbnail and description inspiration
  @aspectsvg

 Super Eggs
  Egg Inc

 ====================================

 =============== Updates ==============

 v1.0, Release - Dec 1
 v1.0.1, Bug Fixes - Dec 2
 v1.0.2, Save code fixes - Dec 4
 v1.0.3, Skip button in the intro - Dec 5
 v1.1, Tutorial fixed, flight UI made better, late game cannons buffed, gravity increased - Dec 7
 v1.1.1, Save code not working, fixed (maybe?) - Dec 13
 v1.1.2, Menu buttons not working after prestiging fixed - Dec 31
 v1.1.3, Fixed Dr. Feathersworth misspellings - Jan 22

 ====================================

title: The Shapeshifting Detective
desc:
Hello! Welcome to my latest project, and animation made for the @griffpatch game jam!! 

- watch on turbowarp for best experience: https://turbowarp.org/1101308136 
-p2 unfortunately postponed :'( 
see: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/1126751993 

⚠️also only one ad per day- otherwise my inbox will implode ⚠️


(and none of those curse messages- if you send one of those I will CURSE you for life)

-12/07/24 -shared after over 35 hours of work
-12/17/24 -featured!!
-12/18/24- 20k views, 1k loves!!!
-12/18/24- @GRIFFPATCH commented!?!
  (comment link in 'other notes') 
- 12/19/24- 30k views, 2k loves!!! 
   (2000th like made by @Gamer_Lutz)
-12/21/24- 50k views, 3k loves!!!
-01/13/25- we go to 4k loves (and 70k views!!!)
 -----------------------------------------------
Stats-
-649 frames                           (I think)
-970 blocks
-32 sprites
-148 scripts
-42 separate sounds
-over 35 hours of work  o_O
-from 65 views to 15000 in under 24 hours 
-from 18 loves to 1100 in under 24 hours

---------------------------------------
Other notes-

-THIS IS AN ANIMATION not a game 
-Not quite finished yet!! p2 postponed :(
-If animation looks choppy, it's due to speed issues on scratch, NOT my bad animating XD
-GRIFFPATCH COMMENT LINK: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/1101308136/#comments-441598991

Oh, and please❤️and ⭐!!!!! (•᷄-•᷅ )

-------------------------------
Credits-

-All art and animating by me, @QueenSparkle88
-Music and sound effects- pixabay.com 
-Fuzzy Glitch screen images- @supersonic109
-CCTV overlay (in the opening)- @The_Mr_Mangos
-Text engine by @griffpatch youtube tutorials
-Text engine font from @Samboy018

Enjoy!!!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: Dog Man Time!
desc:
Holy Smokes! This took me 5 days (ignoring the fact I spent most of my time reading Dog Man books) to execute this finally! *Phew

*NO ADVERTISEMENTS IN THE COMMENTS PLEASE
This makes it harder for me to read through and check my inbox when you guys do this. Please have some consideration for content creators out there. Thank you.

CREDITS:
-All art and sprites are made by me 
-Dav Pilkey for creating Dog Man 
-Dreamworks for creating the (upcoming) movie
- Thanks to Daft Punk for making the amazing 'Harder, Better, Faster, Stronger' song

"HAW! HAW! HAW!" -  Petey (2016 -?)
